name: Hit the Match
description:
It's a match 3 game with a twist. Only Mouse is  required.

Rules:

1.    The player has to HIT the ball to throw it in the direction of the reticle which is controlled by the Mouse pointer,

2. The player has to PULL the ball when it collides with the wall of blocks.  When the ball is pulled, the block with which it had the last contact will break. The player will GAIN A POINT when a block BREAKS,  but he will GAIN MORE POINTS when 3 blocks of SAME COLOUR MATCH either VERTICALLY or HORIZONTALLY.

3.  To GAIN EXTRA POINTS, the player can PULL the ball back when it meets the PROJECTILES  ( fire-balls ) that are RELEASED BY THE ENEMY.

4. Defeat the enemy with the ball WHEN THE REQUIREMENTS ARE MET .

Keys:

1. LMB - To hit the ball with the bat

2. RMB: Pull the ball back when it meets the wall of blocks/fireballs

3. R : Restart the game

4. Esc: Exit the game

All suggestions are welcome.
